alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Clinch; Coffee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 2:39PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Coffee, Atkinson and northwestern Clinch Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 238 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Willacoochee, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Pearson, Willacoochee, Cogdell and Axson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
